TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Message extends System.ValueType

span.span: Implements a Windows message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构包装 Windows 将发送的消息。The structure wraps messages that Windows sends. 此结构可用于包装消息，并将其分配给窗口过程，以进行调度。You can use this structure to wrap a message and assign it to the window procedure to be dispatched. 此结构还可用于获取有关消息系统发送到你的应用程序或控件的信息。You can also use this structure to get information about a message the system sends to your application or controls. 有关 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅[消息和消息队列](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198815)。For more information about Windows messages, see [Messages and Message Queues](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198815). 无法创建直接。You cannot create the directly. 请改用方法。Instead, use the method. 为了提高效率，使用自己的现有池而不是实例化一个新的活动，如有可能的 s。For the sake of efficiency, the uses its pool of existing s instead of instantiating a new one, if possible. 但是，如果是一个新实例化有池中不可用。However, if a is not available in the pool, a new one is instantiated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以处理操作系统消息中标识。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the . 在此示例中了解另一个应用程序变为活动状态，以便处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 有关可用信息， ，和值，请参阅[MSG 结构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198816)文档。For information about the available , , and values, see the [MSG Structure](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198816) documentation. 实际的常量值有关的信息，请参阅[消息常量](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198817)。For information about the actual constant values, see [Message Constants](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198817). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检索信息从字段的一条消息并将其转换到的对象。Use the method to retrieve information from the field of a message and convert it to an object. 此方法可用于访问在消息中传递的对象。You can use this method to access objects passed in a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段的值取决于消息。The value of this field depends on the message. 使用要获取的用于处理消息的重要信息字段。Use the field to get information that is important for handling the message. 通常用于存储一个对象，如果需要的消息。 is typically used to store an object if it is needed by the message. 使用方法来检索并将信息从转换字段转换为对象。Use the method to retrieve and convert information from the field into an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段的值取决于消息。The value of this field depends on the message. 使用字段可获取对消息处理所非常重要的信息。Use the field to get information that is important to handling the message. 此字段通常用于存储的信息，如标志小的部分。This field is typically used to store small pieces of information, such as flags. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以处理操作系统消息中标识。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the . 在此示例中了解另一个应用程序变为活动状态，以便处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 有关可用信息， ，和值，请参阅[MSG 结构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198816)文档。For information about the available , , and values, see the [MSG Structure](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198816) documentation. 实际的常量值有关的信息，请参阅[消息常量](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198817)。For information about the actual constant values, see [Message Constants](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198817).
